metadata.synopsis: The player has reached the end of the Morphic Pool and has encountered the Netherbrain. It pulls the players into it's mind palace, leading to the player attempting to use the Karsus' Compulsion spell. It fails, leading to the Emperor saving them by opening a portal to the astral prism.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Enter END_MainProceed through to the end of the Morphic Pool (use Teleport to Netherbrain debug cube or go to 783; -12; 1634)Will auto trigger

40.speaker: Narrator
40.text: *Deathly silence, the air stale and putrid.*
40.context: NodeContext: voice in head, telepathic, Emperor not physically present

65.speaker: The Emperor
65.text: It's close. Have the stones ready.
65.context: NodeContext: voice in head, telepathic, Emperor not physically present

61.speaker: Narrator
61.text: *Your blood slows, your senses strung so tight they could snap in an instant.*
61.context:
CinematicNodeContext: [Morphic Pool: Nervous anticipation]

Party looks at each other in nervous anticipation, not sure what's about to happen.

34.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Netherstones rise from about the player's person, combine in mid-air, and drift back into the player's grasp.

44.speaker: Elder Brain
44.context:
CinematicNodeContext: [Morphic Pool: Netherbrain emerges] 

Bubbles on the surface of the morphic pool.
The Netherbrain rises.
Player reacts with horror, and pockets the combined Netherstone.

150.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
150.text: By the Dark Lord - how did it grow so large?

54.text: You think you know why you are here.
54.context: CinematicNodeContext: The world fades into the black winds shown in GOB_Orpheus_VoiceofAbsolute. The player small and insignificant in the full presence of the brain and it's direct attention.

8.text: You think you know why you are here.
8.context: NodeContext: SFX of brain's voice solidifying into a single speaking voice.

80.speaker: The Netherbrain
80.text: You think you know why you are here.
80.context: NodeContext: SFX of brain's voice solidifying into a single speaking voice.

126.speaker: Elder Brain
126.text: You think that by enslaving me with the Netherstones, you will bring your Father's scourge upon the world.
126.context: CinematicNodeContext: A psionic shockwave bursts from the Netherbrain, and the blackwinds whipping around the player kick up.

121.speaker: Elder Brain
121.text: You think you can atone for giving me my power, child of Bhaal, by destroying me with the Netherstones.
121.context: CinematicNodeContext: A psionic shockwave bursts from the Netherbrain, and the blackwinds whipping around the player kick up.

53.speaker: Elder Brain
53.text: You think that by allying with the last of the Chosen and uniting the Netherstones, you can destroy me.
53.context: CinematicNodeContext: A psionic shockwave bursts from the Netherbrain, and the blackwinds whipping around the player kick up.

18.speaker: The Netherbrain
18.text: You think that by killing the Chosen and taking the Netherstones, you can destroy me.
18.context: CinematicNodeContext: A psionic shockwave bursts from the Netherbrain, and the blackwinds whipping around the player kick up.

122.speaker: The Netherbrain
122.context: CinematicNodeContext: A psionic shockwave bursts from the Netherbrain, and the blackwinds whipping around the player kick up.

45.speaker: Player
45.text: It's messing with your mind. Don't listen to it. Use the stones.
45.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player struggles against it and only just stays on their feet.

75.text: It's messing with your mind. Don't listen to it. Use the stones.
75.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player struggles against it and only just stays on their feet.

29.text: It's messing with your mind. Don't listen to it. Use the stones.
29.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player struggles against it and only just stays on their feet.

140.speaker: The Emperor
140.text: It's messing with your mind. Don't listen to it. Use the stones.
140.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Astral Prism drifts to the center of the party, and emits it's psionic shieldNodeContext: [vo only]

23.text: Muster the full might of your physical form - throw it into breaking through the brain's defences.

108.text: Muster the full might of your physical form - throw it into breaking through the brain's defences.
108.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The player (and possibly Gortash) arrive in a vast liminal space created by the Karsus' Compulsion, it's the horrifying manifestation of the Netherbrain's mind.

The Astral Prisim floats next to the player and they give it a nod, acknowleging that they know their work has just begun.

141.text: Muster the full might of your physical form - throw it into breaking through the brain's defences.
141.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The player (and possibly Gortash) arrive in a vast liminal space created by the Karsus' Compulsion, it's the horrifying manifestation of the Netherbrain's mind.

The Astral Prisim floats next to the player and they give it a nod, acknowleging that they know their work has just begun.

41.speaker: Player
41.text: Muster the full might of your physical form - throw it into breaking through the brain's defences.
41.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The player holds the stone in their left hand and thrusts their right forward for the somatic componant.

A spectral form of a massive chained haproon buzzes by the player toward the face forehead of the Netherbrain.

90.speaker: Elder Brain
90.text: By eliminating Ketheric and Orin, you have simply unbound me.
90.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The player holds the stone in their left hand and thrusts their right forward for the somatic componant.

A spectral form of a massive chained haproon buzzes by the player toward the face forehead of the Netherbrain.

99.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The player holds the stone in their left hand and thrusts their right forward for the somatic componant.

A spectral form of a massive chained haproon buzzes by the player toward the face forehead of the Netherbrain.

113.context: CinematicNodeContext: The harpoon sinks deep into the moon-size manifestation of the Netherbrain.

110.text: By eliminating Ketheric and Orin, you have simply unbound me.
110.context: CinematicNodeContext: The spectral harpoon deflects off a psionic barrier created by the Netherbrain and drifts limply in front of the massive visage.

37.text: By eliminating Ketheric and Orin, you have simply unbound me.
37.context: CinematicNodeContext: The spectral harpoon deflects off a psionic barrier created by the Netherbrain and drifts limply in front of the massive visage.

87.speaker: Elder Brain
87.text: By eliminating Ketheric and Orin, you have simply unbound me.
87.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player swaps the nether stone from their left hand to their right.

130.speaker: The Netherbrain
130.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player swaps the nether stone from their left hand to their right.

50.speaker: The Netherbrain
50.text: The Crown is now mine to command - mine alone.
50.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player swaps the nether stone from their left hand to their right.

64.speaker: The Emperor
64.text: Don't listen to it! Focus on the Crown!
64.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player swaps the nether stone from their left hand to their right.

92.text: Draw on the power of the Weave and try again. You will not let the Crown slip from your grasp.
92.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player swaps the nether stone from their left hand to their right.

107.speaker: Player
107.text: Draw on the power of the Weave and try again. You will not let the Crown slip from your grasp.
107.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The player  thrusts their off hand forward, in a mirrored movement of the first phase of the spell.

Another spectal harpoon whooshes by from behind.

36.speaker: Player
36.text: The Crown is an unmissable target - set it in your sights, and trust that you will strike true.
36.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The player  thrusts their off hand forward, in a mirrored movement of the first phase of the spell.

Another spectal harpoon whooshes by from behind.

67.speaker: Elder Brain
67.text: You placed the Crown upon me in the depths of Moonrise Towers, and there I was born.
67.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The player  thrusts their off hand forward, in a mirrored movement of the first phase of the spell.

Another spectal harpoon whooshes by from behind.

49.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The player  thrusts their off hand forward, in a mirrored movement of the first phase of the spell.

Another spectal harpoon whooshes by from behind.

117.context: CinematicNodeContext: The next harpoon sinks deep into the Netherbrain's cranium, not far off from the target of the first.InternalNodeContext: Can't be aliased from previous phase, each harpoon is discrete

77.text: You placed the Crown upon me in the depths of Moonrise Towers, and there I was born.
77.context: CinematicNodeContext: This spectral harpoon deflects off a psionic barrier created by the Netherbrain and drifts limply in front of the massive visage.InternalNodeContext: Can't be aliased from previous phase, each harpoon is discrete

0.text: You placed the Crown upon me in the depths of Moonrise Towers, and there I was born.
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: This spectral harpoon deflects off a psionic barrier created by the Netherbrain and drifts limply in front of the massive visage.InternalNodeContext: Can't be aliased from previous phase, each harpoon is discrete

72.speaker: Elder Brain
72.text: You placed the Crown upon me in the depths of Moonrise Towers, and there I was born.
72.context: CinematicNodeContext: Gortash steps in front of the player, pulling into his grasp. The waves it, unfocused, in the direction of the Netherbrain as a doddered priest might dangle a crucifix before and elder god--ineffectually.

13.speaker: Elder Brain
13.text: Bhaal's Chosen placed the Crown upon me in the depths of Moonrise Towers, and there I was born.
13.context: CinematicNodeContext: Gortash steps in front of the player, pulling into his grasp. The waves it, unfocused, in the direction of the Netherbrain as a doddered priest might dangle a crucifix before and elder god--ineffectually.

47.speaker: The Netherbrain
47.text: The Crown is not my weakness - it is what made me what I am.
47.context: CinematicNodeContext: Gortash steps in front of the player, pulling into his grasp. The waves it, unfocused, in the direction of the Netherbrain as a doddered priest might dangle a crucifix before and elder god--ineffectually.

133.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
133.text: You are delusional - the Crown is how we controlled you!
133.context: CinematicNodeContext: Gortash steps in front of the player, pulling into his grasp. The waves it, unfocused, in the direction of the Netherbrain as a doddered priest might dangle a crucifix before and elder god--ineffectually.

156.text: I respected Bhaal's child once, but not you, Gortash. I allowed you to control me as long as it suited my purpose.
156.context: CinematicNodeContext: Gortash mugs in his ultimate moment of confusion before his head is caught in a localized psionic burst and his body clatters to the ground like stringless puppet.

153.speaker: The Netherbrain
153.text: I respected Bhaal's child once, but not you, Gortash. I allowed you to control me as long as it suited my purpose.
153.context: CinematicNodeContext: Gortash mugs in his ultimate moment of confusion before his head is caught in a localized psionic burst and his body clatters to the ground like stringless puppet.

127.speaker: The Netherbrain
127.text: The delusions are all yours, Gortash. You controlled me only for as long as I allowed you to.
127.context: CinematicNodeContext: Gortash mugs in his ultimate moment of confusion before his head is caught in a localized psionic burst and his body clatters to the ground like stringless puppet.

19.speaker: The Netherbrain
19.context: CinematicNodeContext: Gortash mugs in his ultimate moment of confusion before his head is caught in a localized psionic burst and his body clatters to the ground like stringless puppet.

96.speaker: The Netherbrain
96.text: The next order to be given is mine and it is this - die.
96.context: CinematicNodeContext: Gortash mugs in his ultimate moment of confusion before his head is caught in a localized psionic burst and his body clatters to the ground like stringless puppet.

4.context: CinematicNodeContext: Gortash mugs in his ultimate moment of confusion before his head is caught in a localized psionic burst and his body clatters to the ground like stringless puppet.

155.context: NodeContext: Deadpan - you've just seen the great scheming villain get his head exploded

9.speaker: Player
9.context: NodeContext: Deadpan - you've just seen the great scheming villain get his head exploded

32.speaker: Lae'zel
32.context: NodeContext: Deadpan - you've just seen the great scheming villain get his head exploded

59.speaker: Lae'zel
59.context: NodeContext: Deadpan - you've just seen the great scheming villain get his head exploded

161.speaker: Minsc
161.text: Gah! Boo will be scrubbing scoundrel from his fur for a tenday.
161.context: NodeContext: Deadpan - you've just seen the great scheming villain get his head exploded

62.speaker: Shadowheart
62.text: Hells. Talk about wiping the smirk off his face...
62.context: NodeContext: Deadpan - you've just seen the great scheming villain get his head exploded

145.speaker: Astarion
145.text: Sweet hells! Well, that's what you get.
145.context: NodeContext: Deadpan - you've just seen the great scheming villain get his head exploded

33.speaker: Wyll
33.context: NodeContext: Deadpan - you've just seen the great scheming villain get his head exploded

111.speaker: Gale
111.text: Hells. His mind crumpled like a piece of parchment.
111.context: NodeContext: Deadpan - you've just seen the great scheming villain get his head exploded

26.speaker: Karlach
26.text: Hahaha! Oh wow. Yes. That's what you get, fucker.
26.context: NodeContext: Deadpan - you've just seen the great scheming villain get his head exploded

163.speaker: Halsin
163.text: Oak Father preserve us. That scheming brain is but a feast for the worms now...
163.context: NodeContext: Deadpan - you've just seen the great scheming villain get his head exploded

1.speaker: Jaheira
1.text: Huh. That great big brain of his got him in the end.
1.context: NodeContext: Deadpan - you've just seen the great scheming villain get his head exploded

42.speaker: Player
42.text: You are strong. You are mighty. You will dominate the brain.
42.context: CinematicNodeContext: The combined stones float up into frame from Gortash's body (we don't need to see it leave his body), settling in mid-air above the player's palm.

14.text: You are strong. You are mighty. You will dominate the brain.
14.context: CinematicNodeContext: The combined stones float up into frame from Gortash's body (we don't need to see it leave his body), settling in mid-air above the player's palm.

81.text: You are strong. You are mighty. You will dominate the brain.
81.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player clasps the combined Netherstones close to their heart and they refocus their efforts.

151.text: You are strong. You are mighty. You will dominate the brain.
151.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player clasps the combined Netherstones close to their heart and they refocus their efforts.

22.speaker: Player
22.text: You are strong. You are mighty. You will dominate the brain.
22.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player  thrusts both hands forward, sending forth a new harpoon.

16.speaker: The Netherbrain
16.text: When the parasite entered your ruined mind - you became a pawn in my design.
16.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player  thrusts both hands forward, sending forth a new harpoon.

56.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player  thrusts both hands forward, sending forth a new harpoon.

139.context: CinematicNodeContext: The third harpoon sinks deep into the Netherbrain's cranium, not far off from the target of the second.InternalNodeContext: Can't be aliased from previous phase, each harpoon is discrete

109.text: When the parasite entered your ruined mind - you became a pawn in my design.
109.context: CinematicNodeContext: This spectral harpoon deflects off a psionic barrier created by the Netherbrain and drifts limply in front of the massive visage.InternalNodeContext: Can't be aliased from previous phase, each harpoon is discrete

118.text: When the parasite entered your ruined mind - you became a pawn in my design.
118.context: CinematicNodeContext: This spectral harpoon deflects off a psionic barrier created by the Netherbrain and drifts limply in front of the massive visage.InternalNodeContext: Can't be aliased from previous phase, each harpoon is discrete

46.speaker: The Netherbrain
46.text: When the parasite entered your ruined mind - you became a pawn in my design.
46.context: CinematicNodeContext: The brain focuses its beady eyes on the player.

101.speaker: The Netherbrain
101.text: Who do you think told the Chosen about the Astral Prism?
101.context: NodeContext: absolute shock and horror as it realises it wasn't even slightly special

68.speaker: The Netherbrain
68.text: Who do you think planted the knowledge of Orpheus' power, and the fear of what it could do?
68.context: NodeContext: absolute shock and horror as it realises it wasn't even slightly special

51.speaker: The Netherbrain
51.text: When the Chosen sent my thralls to retrieve the Prism - who do you think let the 'Emperor' slip its leash, knowing it would be the one to bring you to me?
51.context: NodeContext: absolute shock and horror as it realises it wasn't even slightly special

88.speaker: The Emperor
88.text: We were part of its plan...
88.context: NodeContext: absolute shock and horror as it realises it wasn't even slightly special

11.speaker: The Netherbrain
11.text: I only needed one Netherstone loosened from the Chosen's grasp to guarantee my freedom.
11.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player, holding the composite Netherstone in both hands, slowly brings it to their forehead for the final phase of the spell.

25.speaker: The Netherbrain
25.text: You brought all three back to me. In doing so, you have liberated me.
25.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player, holding the composite Netherstone in both hands, slowly brings it to their forehead for the final phase of the spell.

119.speaker: The Netherbrain
119.text: This was your role - and it is complete.
119.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player, holding the composite Netherstone in both hands, slowly brings it to their forehead for the final phase of the spell.

93.speaker: The Netherbrain
93.text: Now you will witness the Grand Design.
93.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player, holding the composite Netherstone in both hands, slowly brings it to their forehead for the final phase of the spell.

28.speaker: Player
28.text: Again! The Grand Design must not come to pass!
28.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player, holding the composite Netherstone in both hands, slowly brings it to their forehead for the final phase of the spell.

12.speaker: Lae'zel
12.text: Again! The Grand Design must not come to pass!
12.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player, holding the composite Netherstone in both hands, slowly brings it to their forehead for the final phase of the spell.

30.speaker: Player
30.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player, holding the composite Netherstone in both hands, slowly brings it to their forehead for the final phase of the spell.

105.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player, holding the composite Netherstone in both hands, slowly brings it to their forehead for the final phase of the spell.

131.speaker: Player
131.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player closes their eyes to focus, holding the Netherstone to their head. Their eyes pop open as 3 new spectal harpoons spiral toward the brain. Sinking deeper into it's face.

57.speaker: The Emperor
57.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player closes their eyes to focus, holding the Netherstone to their head. Their eyes pop open as 3 new spectal harpoons spiral toward the brain. Sinking deeper into it's face.

147.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player closes their eyes to focus, holding the Netherstone to their head. Their eyes pop open as 3 new spectal harpoons spiral toward the brain. Sinking deeper into it's face.

83.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The brain shakes its promethean head, and all chains dissapate.

The player has failed.

85.context: CinematicNodeContext: The brain lets out a psionic boom that knocks the player and their party to the ground.

38.context: CinematicNodeContext: The brain lets out a psionic boom that knocks the player and their party to the ground.

134.context: CinematicNodeContext: The brain lets out a psionic boom that knocks the player and their party to the ground.

43.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The Astral Prism expands into a portal appears and the emperor levitates through.

Emperor faces down the brain.

106.speaker: The Emperor
106.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Emperor psionically flings the player through the portal into safety, then goes into the portal and closes it.

138.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Netherbrain speaks as the Astral Prism itself retreats through the Karsus' Portal

15.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The (faceless) brain blasts upwards through the ceiling.  
Cut to Upper City, the evolved Netherbrain is levitating above the High Hall. Nautiloids arrive, flanking the brain, and a pulse of psychic energy washes over the city.

162.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The (faceless) brain blasts upwards through the ceiling.  
Cut to Upper City, the evolved Netherbrain is levitating above the High Hall. Nautiloids arrive, flanking the brain, and a pulse of psychic energy washes over the city.

157.context:
CinematicNodeContext: [Real world: Ceremorphosis, baby!]

Cut to: Baldur's Gate streets. The infected begin to transform. Chaos, screaming, panic.

144.context:
CinematicNodeContext: [Fade to black]

Camera pans back up to nautiloids arriving above city. Fade to black. Feels like we're about to get a game over scene.

73.speaker: Player
73.context: NodeContext: Shock and panic, the player has just chosen to give up to the elder brain

66.speaker: Player
66.context: NodeContext: Shock and panic, the player has just chosen to give up to the elder brain

148.speaker: Player
148.context: NodeContext: Shock and panic, the player has just chosen to give up to the elder brain

124.speaker: Player
124.context: NodeContext: Shock and panic, the player has just chosen to give up to the elder brain

125.speaker: Player
125.context: NodeContext: Shock and panic, the player has just chosen to give up to the elder brain

120.speaker: Player
120.text: Give up. Allow the brain to dominate you.
120.context: NodeContext: Shock and panic, the player has just chosen to give up to the elder brain

48.speaker: Player
48.text: Whoa, whoa, soldier, what are you doing?!
48.context: NodeContext: Shock and panic, the player has just chosen to give up to the elder brain

52.speaker: Karlach
52.text: Whoa, whoa, soldier, what are you doing?!
52.context: NodeContext: Shock and panic, the player has just chosen to give up to the elder brain

3.speaker: Jaheira
3.text: What are you doing? Fight. Fight!
3.context: NodeContext: Incredulous, panicked - at the critical moment, the player is giving in and allowing the brain to dominate them. Game over, everyone dies.

74.speaker: Player
74.text: You FOOL. You have ruined us all.

100.speaker: The Emperor
100.text: You FOOL. You have ruined us all.

7.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
7.context: NodeContext: straj is drow for 'damn' as a horrified exclamation here.She is about to die - along with everyone else - because the player surrendered to the elder brain.

55.speaker: Lae'zel
55.text: No - stop! This isn't the way!

86.speaker: Gale
86.text: What in the hells are you doing?
86.context: NodeContext: Urgent/horrified - the player is surrendering to the enemy you're trying to fight!

95.speaker: Astarion
95.text: No - what are you doing? Fight, damn you!
95.context: NodeContext: watching shocked as the player gives up and lets the brain control them

114.speaker: Minsc
114.text: My friend...? MY FRIEND! Now is no time for the napping!

70.speaker: Shadowheart
70.text: We need to put a stop to this - now!

112.speaker: Astarion
112.text: We have to stop it - it's now or never!

104.speaker: Wyll
104.text: No! We have to stop this!

82.speaker: Gale
82.text: We can't afford to let that happen.

39.speaker: Karlach
39.text: Shit - no! It's all been leading to this - we stop the brain. Now!
39.context: NodeContext: Resolute - we've been bruised but not beaten, we can't give up yet

152.speaker: Halsin
152.text: No, we cannot give up - not after all we have been through.
152.context: NodeContext: Resolute - we've been bruised but not beaten, we can't give up yet

132.speaker: Jaheira
132.text: We are not done yet. Try again!
132.context: NodeContext: Resolute - we've been bruised but not beaten, we can't give up yet

35.speaker: Minsc
35.text: NO! Minsc of Rashemen has never bowed to a brain, and we will not begin today. AGAIN!
35.context: NodeContext: with fury and desperation - the final battle against the netherbrain is raging, and Minthara responds to the brain declaring that the party will 'witness the grand design'.

21.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
21.text: No - the abomination shall witness our vengeance! Refocus your efforts!
21.context: NodeContext: with fury and desperation - the final battle against the netherbrain is raging, and Minthara responds to the brain declaring that the party will 'witness the grand design'.

159.speaker: The Netherbrain
159.text: And you - you had your role to play, too.
159.context: CinematicNodeContext: The brain focuses its beady eyes on the player. NodeContext: Brain addresses the player

20.speaker: Player
20.text: Your resilience will not be shaken - cast the spell again.

128.speaker: Player
128.text: It may not be easy, but it was always supposed to be possible - do it again.

31.speaker: Player
31.text: Bow before the glory of the Netherbrain. Submit to domination.

6.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
6.text: Straj. We can not suffer the same fate...
6.context: NodeContext: /stræd͡ʒ/ - drow language 'damn', delivered as a startled curse. The final battle against the netherbrain is about to begin, and an ally just had their head telepathically detonated by the brain. Minthara is shocked and scared.

103.speaker: The Emperor
103.text: Resist! You cannot let it do the same to you!

91.speaker: Elder Brain
91.text: You brought the Crown to me, Bhaalspawn, thinking the army I amassed with it would become yours.

58.speaker: The Netherbrain
58.text: You brought the Crown to me, Bhaalspawn, thinking the army I amassed with it would become yours.

24.speaker: The Netherbrain
24.text: Your plan was devious, your cruelty unparalleled. I would have followed it, were your mind not destroyed by your sister.

116.speaker: The Netherbrain
116.text: But with you gone, the three pitiful Chosen fought like children in your wake. I gave them power to harm one another with, while I crafted my design.

89.speaker: The Netherbrain
89.text: I used the Chosen, while they thought they used me. But the orders are now mine to give.

27.speaker: The Emperor
27.text: I won't allow it. Again! Dominate it!

136.speaker: Elder Brain
136.text: I needed the Crown to build an army. I needed the Chosen to bring it to me.

10.speaker: The Netherbrain
10.text: I needed the Crown to build an army. I needed the Chosen to bring it to me.

97.speaker: The Netherbrain
97.text: They would not have surrendered it freely, so I gave them what they wanted - power.

98.speaker: The Netherbrain
98.text: Just enough that they would play their part in my design.

146.speaker: The Netherbrain
146.text: Their part has ended. The next orders will be mine.

71.speaker: Player
71.text: A first attempt is just that - iteration is key. Aim for the Crown and try again.

149.speaker: Player
149.text: Nothing is immune to influence - determine to master the brain.

143.speaker: The Netherbrain
143.text: By eliminating Ketheric, Orin, and Gortash, you have simply unbound me.

115.speaker: Player
115.text: Your mind is yours to command - block out all possibility of failure and compel the brain to submit.

158.speaker: Player
158.text: You have survived this far - trust yourself. Dominate the brain.

76.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player is completely wiped off their feet - the stones scatter almost out of reach. Player pulls them back at last minute and scrabbles to their feet.

142.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player is completely wiped off their feet - the stones scatter almost out of reach. Player pulls them back at last minute and scrabbles to their feet.

135.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
135.text: Rise. I, Lord Enver Gortash, Chosen of Bane, command you.
135.context: CinematicNodeContext: Gortash raises his Netherstone into the air to command the brain, like he's done a million times before.

160.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Gortash's stone drifts out of his hand.

He reacts with surprise as floats in front of the player, joing its counterpart Netherstones collected from the defeated Chosen.

The three stones combine in mid-air, and land in the player's hand.
